Buses to Bangalore to davanagere are avaiable very frequenty . Chitradurga comes 1 hour before davanagere.

Bangalore to Bombay Buses will go.

Limited Trains are available

Located at a Distance of 202 kms. northwest of Bangalore. Chitradurga Fort is renowned for its Kallina Kote / Ukinna kote / Elu Suttina kote which was built in parts by the Palegar Nayakas, Hyder Ali and Tipu Sultan. It comprises a series of seven enclosure walls in Kannada. Eighteen ancient temples can be found inside the fort. This seemingly impregnable fort has 19 gateways, 38 posterior entrances, a palace, a mosque, granaries, oil pits, four secret entrances and water tanks.

The other places apart from fort in chitradurga are

value: Muruga rajendra Mutt with 20 to 25 acres of garden around it, NH4 highway
Jogimatti- A hill station- 10 kms from fort
Aadumalleshwara- A reservoir of few wild animals- On the way to jogimatti

There are few restaurants available in chitradurga: Aishwarya fort(NH4), Amogha International(Inside the city, Near santhe maidaana), Naveen regency(NH4) ...
